text.more:
To explore this graph you can select an event and see who the performers were. You can also select a performer and discover 
the events they were involved in. The larger circles represent an event or performance. The smaller circles represent the 
performers. The lines represent the performances that each performer was involved in. Typing a name in the search bar will allow 
you to select a specific performer or performance and see what they were involved in.
text.intro: Network Map of Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander performances and performers from the North of Australia between 1935 and 1975
text.title: Network Map of NT Performers and Events
